definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: Experts said the study should prompt countries to reconsider how they classify drugs.
sentences.chinese: 專家稱，這項研究應該促使各國重新考慮藥品的分類。

sentences.english: A limitation of the analysis was that population-specific effects were not considered.
sentences.chinese: 這項分析的限制是並未考慮到族羣特定的效應。

sentences.english: Factor in all the schools you’re applying to and any back-up options.
sentences.chinese: 考慮你所有申請的學校和後備選擇。

sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱們暫時不要考慮，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: AMERICA'S political priorities have undergone a breathtaking about-turn.
sentences.chinese: 美國政治上優先考慮的事情已然經歷了一個大轉變。

sentences.english: Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines are considering new price controls or subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 泰國，馬來西亞以及菲律賓都在考慮價格控制和補貼。

sentences.english: Hitchcock also got a perverse thrill out of taking audiences on a voyeuristic roller-coaster ride.
sentences.chinese: 希區柯克也有有害刺激的考慮受衆的偷窺過山車旅程。

sentences.english: Consider that each resource pool has its own set of registered image templates.
sentences.chinese: 要考慮給每一個資源池指定自己的註冊圖像模板集。

sentences.english: Therefore, you have to think of the possibility that this was one of the reasons for domesticating dogs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你必須考慮這可能是馴化狗只的其中一個原因。

sentences.english: Luckily, it's very straight-forward and takes less than half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，這是非常直接的，並考慮不到一個半小時。

sentences.english: If there is only one deacon , he takes his place at the right of the celebrant.
sentences.chinese: 如果只有一個執事，他考慮他的位置在右邊的禮。

sentences.english: The possibility of a last-ditch resistance by the enemy should not be dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 敵人負隅頑抗的可能性是不可不加考慮的。

sentences.english: The grocer studies to please his customers.
sentences.chinese: 雜貨商老闆考慮着要迎合顧客。

sentences.english: The capsid architecture is an important feature to consider in the characterization of viruses.
sentences.chinese: 衣殼構造是考慮病毒的一個重要方面。

sentences.english: The scientists considered putting a small mechanical mixer in the storage tank.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們考慮在儲存罐裏放進小型機械攪拌機。
在求解中考慮了與頻率有關的參數。

definition: to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
